content:
ConfigurationSet Class

Definition

The ConfigurationSet class represents a configuration set for one or more AD LDS instances.

In this Article

public class ConfigurationSet
Inheritance
System.Object
ConfigurationSet

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Properties

AdamInstances

Gets a read-only collection of AD LDS instances that are in the configuration set.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection AdamInstances { get; }
Value
AdamInstanceCollection

An AdamInstanceCollection object that contains the AdamInstance objects that are in the configuration set.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

ApplicationPartitions

Gets a read-only collection of application partitions that are in the configuration set.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartitionCollection ApplicationPartitions { get; }
Value
ApplicationPartitionCollection

An ApplicationPartitionCollection object that contains the ApplicationPartition objects that are in the configuration set.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Name

Gets the name of the ConfigurationSet object.

public string Name { get; }
Value
String

A String that contains the name of the ConfigurationSet object.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

NamingRoleOwner

Gets the AD LDS instance that is the current owner of the domain naming master role.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance NamingRoleOwner { get; }
Value
AdamInstance

An AdamInstance object that represents the AD LDS instance that currently holds the domain naming master role.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Schema

Gets the schema object for the configuration set.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema Schema { get; }
Value
ActiveDirectorySchema

An ActiveDirectorySchema object that represents the schema for this configuration set.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

SchemaRoleOwner

Gets the AD LDS instance that is the current owner of the schema operations master role.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance SchemaRoleOwner { get; }
Value
AdamInstance

An AdamInstance object that represents the AD LDS+

instance that currently holds the schema operations master role.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Sites

Gets a read-only collection of sites that are in the configuration set.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteCollection Sites { get; }
Value
ReadOnlySiteCollection

An ReadOnlySiteCollection object that contains ActiveDirectorySite objects that are in the configuration set.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Methods

Dispose()

Releases all managed and unmanaged resources that are used by the object.

public void Dispose ();

Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases managed resources.

protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
disposing
Boolean

A Boolean value that determines if the managed resources should be released. true if the managed resources should be released; false if only the unmanaged resources should be released.

FindAdamInstance()

Finds an AD LDS instance in this configuration set.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindAdamInstance ();
Returns
AdamInstance

An AdamInstance object that represents an AD LDS instance that was found.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

An AD LDS instance could be not found in this configuration set.

FindAdamInstance(String)

Finds an AD LDS instance in this configuration set for a given partition name.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindAdamInstance (string partitionName);
partitionName
String

A String that specifies a partition in which to search.

Returns
AdamInstance

An AdamInstance object that represents an AD LDS instance that was found.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

partitionName is null.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

An AD LDS instance for the specified partitionName could not be found in this configuration set.

FindAdamInstance(String,String)

Finds an AD LDS instance in this configuration set for a given partition name and site name.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindAdamInstance (string partitionName, string siteName);
partitionName
String

A String that specifies a partition in which to search.

siteName
String

A String that specifies a site in which to search.

Returns
AdamInstance

An AdamInstance object that represents an AD LDS instance that was found.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

siteName is null.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

An AD LDS instance for the specified partitionName and siteName parameters could not be found in this configuration set.

FindAllAdamInstances()

Returns all AD LDS instances in this configuration set.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAllAdamInstances ();
Returns
AdamInstanceCollection

An AdamInstanceCollection object that contains the AdamInstance objects that were found.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

FindAllAdamInstances(String)

Returns all AD LDS instances in this configuration set for a given partition name.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAllAdamInstances (string partitionName);
partitionName
String

A String that specifies a partition in which to search.

Returns
AdamInstanceCollection

An AdamInstanceCollection object that contains the AdamInstance objects that were found.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

partitionName is null.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

FindAllAdamInstances(String,String)

Returns all AD LDS instances in this configuration set for a given partition name and site name.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAllAdamInstances (string partitionName, string siteName);
partitionName
String

A String that specifies a partition in which to search.

siteName
String

A String that specifies a partition in which to search.

Returns
AdamInstanceCollection

An AdamInstanceCollection object that contains the AdamInstance objects that are found.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

siteName is null.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

GetConfigurationSet(DirectoryContext)

Returns an ConfigurationSet object for the specified directory context.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet GetConfigurationSet (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context);
context
DirectoryContext

An DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object. The target of the context can be an AD LDS instance or keywords that are specified in the serviceConnectionPoint object in the current forest that can identify the configuration set.

Returns
ConfigurationSet

A ConfigurationSet object that represents the configuration set for the specified context.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

A target specified in the context parameter could not be found.

ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentNullException

context is null.

ArgumentException

The context parameter is not valid.

GetDirectoryEntry()

Gets the DirectoryEntry object for the configuration partition.

public System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry ();
Returns
DirectoryEntry

The DirectoryEntry object for the configuration partition.

GetSecurityLevel()

Returns the AD LDS replication security level.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationSecurityLevel GetSecurityLevel ();
Returns
ReplicationSecurityLevel

A ReplicationSecurityLevel value that indicates the current AD LDS replication authentication mode.

SetSecurityLevel(ReplicationSecurityLevel)

Sets the AD LDS replication security level.

public void SetSecurityLevel (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationSecurityLevel securityLevel);
securityLevel
ReplicationSecurityLevel

The ReplicationSecurityLevel value to which to set the AD LDS replication authentication mode.

Exceptions
InvalidEnumArgumentException

securityLevel is not a valid ReplicationSecurityLevel value.

ToString()

Returns the name of the ConfigurationSet object.

public override string ToString ();
Returns
String

A String that contains the name of the current ConfigurationSet object.
